content: Man, I have been searching for a video all freaking morning long. I'm an electrician, not an Internet pro-boarder, and I am getting frustrated. I need to find a FREE and LEGAL video (like You Tube) of an episode of "Touched By An Angel" to link to a friend. There is a message in there that I cannot and will not say, choosing instead to let it speak for me in a certain segment towards the end of the episode. I recorded it via DVR, so I have its information. But I need something that I can link in an email and say, "Fast forward to 47 minutes into it and watch from 0:47 to 0:52" or some such statement. Can you help me dig up a YouTube-ish video of this, please? I'd be very grateful. Touched by an Angel Episode 183 Original air date: 06 Oct 2001 (10/06/01) "The Perfect Game" It's not that there is no God or that He isn't listening. You're probably just asking the wrong questions.

content: quote: Originally posted by FollowMeInfantry: Man, I have been searching for a video all freaking morning long. I'm an electrician, not an Internet pro-boarder, and I am getting frustrated. I need to find a FREE and LEGAL video (like You Tube) of an episode of "Touched By An Angel" to link to a friend. There is a message in there that I cannot and will not say, choosing instead to let it speak for me in a certain segment towards the end of the episode. I recorded it via DVR, so I have its information. But I need something that I can link in an email and say, "Fast forward to 47 minutes into it and watch from 0:47 to 0:52" or some such statement. Can you help me dig up a YouTube-ish video of this, please? I'd be very grateful. Touched by an Angel Episode 183 Original air date: 06 Oct 2001 (10/06/01) "The Perfect Game" Do a google video search for "touched by an angel the perfect game" and there are 5 excerpts from the show, I don't know if any of them have the specific part you are looking for.

content: quote: I recorded it via DVR, so I have its information. But I need something that I can link in an email and say, "Fast forward to 47 minutes into it and watch from 0:47 to 0:52" or some such statement. Do you have any way to burn a DVD from the DVR? If so just burn the part you want and upload it to Photobucket, hoping they don't kick it out for copyright infringement. Usually they allow small snippets to be posted. How come I pressed "One for English" and still can't understand a word the dude is saying?

content: quote: Originally posted by Vicdude: quote: I recorded it via DVR, so I have its information. But I need something that I can link in an email and say, "Fast forward to 47 minutes into it and watch from 0:47 to 0:52" or some such statement. Do you have any way to burn a DVD from the DVR? If so just burn the part you want and upload it to Photobucket, hoping they don't kick it out for copyright infringement. Usually they allow small snippets to be posted. I actually called Dish about that, as Radio Shack sells an external storage drive for their equipment. According to the guy I spoke with, Dish encodes everything so that it can never be copied or burned. It is copyright enforcement, according to him. It appears that my only option is to buy the season and then send her the disk with instructions of where to look for the information I'd like her to have. Then again, I could just replay the episode in that time frame and type in an email the text... I'll probably just do that. It's not that there is no God or that He isn't listening. You're probably just asking the wrong questions.
